'''Brooke Blanchard''' is a woman who got burned while pregnant during the train crash.

==History==
===Getting Pregnant===
Brooke and her friend, Jana, whom she'd known since third grade, decided they wanted to be parents, but they didn't have romantic partners, so they decided to find a sperm donor, get pregnant, and they'd raise their children together.

===Train Crash===
When they were nine months pregnant, Jana and Brooke were in a train crash. Jana had only a laceration that needed stitches, but Brooke was seriously burned. While she was being treated for her burns, Brooke went into labor and was told she'd need a c-section because her burns meant she was in no condition to push. Brooke asked for a lawyer, so she could sign paperwork ensuring that their son would go to Jana if she died. While she was in surgery, Jana labored and delivered her baby.

==Relationships==
===Familial===
She and Jana have a son and a daughter together.

===Friendships===
She and Jana have been best friends since third grade. When they decided they wanted children, they found a sperm donor and decided to raise their kids together. She gave birth to their son while Jana gave birth to their daughter.
